q: R), Dana Point, who sits on the Banking and Budget Committees, said bankruptcy allowed Orange County to work out its problems in the 1990s. But California, she said, is a different matter. I'm a little bit leery of its impact on our state and the rest of our local municipalities, Diane Harkey said. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
